conbody.p: This document shows you how to install and run Windows Application Driver (WinAppDriver) on a Windows 10 machine before performing Windows Desktop Apps tests.

li.p: The test machine is where you have the Application Under Test installed and tested.

p.b: What is the test runner machine?

ul.li: The test runner machine is where you install Katalon Studio and store the test scripts.
The test runner machine and the test machine can be the same machine or different ones (remote connection)
